meanings.definition: A group of states with a central government but independence in internal affairs.
meanings.sent1: The federation of countries worked together for common goals.
meanings.sent2: The European Union is an example of a federation of nations.
meanings.sent3: The federation of animals in the forest held a meeting to discuss sharing resources.
meanings.sent4: The federation of superheroes united to fight against the alien invasion.
meanings.sent5: The powerful federation of planets in the galaxy was known for its unity and strength.

meanings.definition: The action of forming states or organizations into a single group with centralized control.
meanings.sent1: The political leader proposed the federation of all regions under one rule.
meanings.sent2: The federation of companies helped streamline operations and increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The federation of students in the school decided to organize a talent show.
meanings.sent4: The federation of tribes brought peace and prosperity to the land.
meanings.sent5: The grand federation of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend on the canvas.
